abilities.name: Abilities
abilities.description:
Immutable: It can't be transformed.
Statblocks // Artificials Statblocks // Artificials 121 121 Bestiary Necrophidius TL: 2.0 Large Artificial/Undead Slithering, animated bones with a serpentine form and humanoid head.
HD: 2 (9 HP)  Speed: 25' Zone: Frontline Morale: -  # Appearing: 1 Senses: Blindsight Armor: 2 [as Chain] Immune: Poison Weak: Blunt Status Immunities: Fatigued, Sickened, Suffocating ACTIONS Dance of Death [Cast, Remote | Will]: Dazed (Cd4) Bite [Melee Attack]: 4 (d8) and pass [Endure] or become Sickened (Cd4, Paralyzed) ABILITIES Immutable: It can't be transformed.
